src:
V novi številki Primorskih novic preberite
01 Nov 2019, 19:18 by Spletno uredništvo

Vodilna struktura Študentske organizacije Univerze na Primorskem (Šoup) je tudi po nedavnih volitvah ohranila svoj vpliv, z njimi tudi nekdanji funkcionar Sebastjan Kokl, a se odpor proti samovoljnemu ravnanju študentske politične oligarhije povečuje. Del protestnikov napoveduje nadaljevanje boja za spremembo delovanja Šoupa, svoje mnenje je izrazil tudi senat UP.



Pred desetimi dnevi se je na protestnem shodu zbralo bistveno več študentov, kot jih je volilo na ponovljenih volitvah. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA

Upokojenci brezplačno iz kraja v kraj
Upokojenci oziroma starejši od 65 let, gibalno ovirani študenti in invalidi, registrirani športniki in dijaki ter vojni veterani bodo od 1. julija leta 2020 imeli brezplačen medkrajevni javni potniški promet.
Občina sama v obnovo oken in vrat gradu Prem
Občina Ilirska Bistrica bo zamenjala in obnovila okna, polkna in vrata premskega gradu.
V zaklonišču na Markovcu bo mladinski center
Koprska občina bo v zaklonišču pod parkiriščem na Cesti na Markovec uredila četrtni mladinski center, ki bo podružnica Centra mladih Koper (CMK).
Za kvadratni meter stanovanja 3000 evrov
Konec leta bo na Seči končana trenutno edina stanovanjska gradnja v piranski občini.
Uporabnice proti selitvi medgeneracijskega centra v Novi Gorici
Prostore v Ulici Gradnikove brigade, kjer je medgeneracijski center, bo morda občina potrebovala za druge namene. Uporabnice ostro nasprotujejo morebitni selitvi.
Kriminalistu podaljšali hišni pripor
Koprski kriminalist Matjaž Hrovatin, ki so ga pred mesecem dni aretirali zaradi suma kaznivega dejanja neupravičene proizvodnje in prometa s prepovedanimi drogami, ostaja v hišnem priporu.
Maestro bi bil gotovo ponosen
Operni večer v Kulturnem domu Hrvatini so posvetili spominu na dirigenta Vladimirja Koblerja.
Osebnost Primorske meseca oktobra
Kdo so kandidati za osebnost Primorske meseca oktobra?
Sulejmanović proti svojim
V prvi SNL bo v nedeljo Tabor gostil zadnjeuvrščeni velenjski Rudar.
V prilogi Sobota:
- Pred 80 leti so javnosti prvič predstavili najlonke
- Kaj jesti za boljšo odpornost?
- Bogata 115-letna zgodovina Slovenskega planinskega društva Trst
- Starši, ki jim je otrok umrl med nosečnostjo ali kmalu po porodu, se soočajo s hudo preizkušnjo
- Nataša Frank iz Ilirske Bistrice ustvarja didaktične igrače za najmlajše
text:
Read the new issue of Primorska News
01 Nov 2019, 19:18 by Web Editing

The governing structure of the Student Organization of the University of Primorska (Šoup) has retained its influence even after the recent elections, with former functionary Sebastjan Kokl, but resistance to the arbitrary behavior of the student political oligarchy is increasing. Part of the protesters predicts the continuation of the fight to change Shoupe's actions, and the UP Senate has expressed his opinion.



Ten days ago, significantly more students gathered at a protest rally than they did in a repeat election. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA

Seniors free from place to place
Seniors and seniors 65, physically impaired students and disabled people, registered athletes and students and war veterans will have free long-distance public transit service from 1 July 2020.
The municipality itself is renovating the windows and doors of Prem Castle
The municipality of Ilirska Bistrica will replace and restore the windows, shutters and doors of the Prem Castle.
There will be a youth center in the shelter at Markovac
In the shelter under the parking lot on Cesta na Markovec, the municipality of Koper will set up a fourth youth center, which will be a branch of the Koper Youth Center (CMK).
For a square meter of apartment 3000 euros
At the end of the year, currently the only residential construction in the municipality of Piran will be completed in Seca.
Beneficiaries against moving an intergenerational center in Nova Gorica
Premises on Gradnikova Brigada Street, where the intergenerational center is located, may be needed by the municipality for other purposes. The users strongly oppose any move.
Extended detention on criminal record
Koper criminalist Matjaz Hrovatin, who was arrested a month ago on suspicion of the criminal offense of Illicit Production and Trafficking in Narcotics, remains in house arrest.
Maestro would certainly be proud
The opera night at the Hrvatin Cultural Center was dedicated to the memory of conductor Vladimir Kobler.
The personality of the Littoral in October
Who are the candidates for Primorska in October?
Sulejmanovic against his own
The first SNL will be hosted on Sunday by the last-ranked Miner of Velenje.
In the attachment Saturday:
- 80 years ago, nylons were first introduced to the public
- What to eat for better resistance?
- A rich 115-year history of the Slovenian Alpine Association of Trieste
- Parents whose baby died during pregnancy or shortly after childbirth face severe ordeal
- Natasha Frank from Ilirska Bistrica creates didactic toys for the youngest
